me.Treidex.Game.GameObject.Components.Colliders

Class Collider

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Treidex.Game.GameObject.Components.Component
      • me.Treidex.Game.GameObject.Components.Colliders.Collider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EllipseCollider, RectangleCollider

    public abstract class Collider
extends Component
    Colliders! Without them, you'd go right through your best friend.
    Author:
    Treidex
